content.rendered:
Creator Brie Larson

Directed by Brie Larson. Smriti Mundhra. Elegance Bratton. Ashley Eakin. Sydney Freeland. Ekwa Msangi. Kishori Rajan. Bernardo Ruiz. Yara Shahidi. Rudy Valdez

Written by Brie Larson

Cast T. Shyvonne Stewart( Therapist1 episode, 2022 ). Chhoyang Cheshatsang( Dude1 episode ). Reid Richards( Young Gavin1 episode ). David Littleton( Professor1 episode ). Dutch Eldridge( Football Player1 episode ). Cailyn Peddle( Lunchroom Girl1 episode ). Si Chen( Coding Teacher1 episode ). Elena Leilani( Young Sofia1 episode ). Danika Jackson( Classmate1 episode ). Emily Nash( Middle School Teacher1 episode ). Jake Blakeslee( Prom Attendee1 episode ). Zina Louhaichy( Classmate1 episode ). Hayden Bercy( Camper1 episode ). Henry Eden( Tech Bro1 episode ). Carly Post( Auditorium Attendee1 episode ). Tanner Pastore( David’s basketball friend1 episode ). Laura Jean Spineti( Lunchroom Girl1 episode ). Jen Chen( Lunchroom Girl1 episode ). Rachel Norman( Superhero Volunteer 11 episode ). Kylie Q. Pinnock( Young Vanessa1 episode ). Justin Chevalier( White House Press1 episode )

Language English

Producers Zada Clarke. Sara Masetti. Travis Callahan. Nicole Galovski. Cherice Hunt. Brie Larson. Kristie Lutz. Jaselle Martino. Raeshem Nijhon. Carri Twigg. Lauren Cynamon. Ashley George. Laura Schmidt

Production Culture House.

Certificate 12+

Season 1

Episodes 10
